post.text: The most fundamental duty of government is to protect American lives. The Obama-Clinton administration has failed to protect our people. As President, my number one priority will ALWAYS be to keep you and your families safe. Believe me, together, we WILL Make America SAFE Again! #ImWithYou

comment.author: Mason
comment.text: The Don, sounds like a mob boss to me. Anyways Mr. Trump, since you want a fence up to keep illegal immigrants coming in from Mexico then make sure one goes up no matter what. How? Spend your own money. But all the property on the border of Mexico and build the fence...

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: You do realize ILLEGAL immigration is against the laws of our country and EVERY OTHER country on Earth?????? Smh... Guess we should overlook ALL crimes. Good grief

replies.author: Mason
replies.text: Ssssh, Shut your mouth I am exercising my right first amendment. I'm a Hereditary Chief an ORIGINAL from this Country. Where your really come from. Your all illegal if I say your illegal. I am the Arbritraitor, I come from a Judges family. I come from a Sovereign Tribes, several Tribes of this land. That stretches across America...
